mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_SEQ ,A.USER_ID ,A.USER_PW ,A.SALT ,A.STATUS FROM dbo.T_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = @USER_ID

SELECT A.USER_SEQ ,A.USER_ID ,A.USER_NAME ,A.REG_DATE ,A.UPDATE_DATE ,A.LAST_LOGIN_DATE ,A.STATUS ,ROLES = (SELECT STRING_AGG(AA.ROLE, ',') FROM dbo.T_USER_ROLE AA WHERE AA.USER_SEQ = A.USER_SEQ) FROM dbo.T_USER A WHERE A.USER_SEQ = @USER_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE dbo.T_USER SET USER_PW = @USER_PW ,SALT = @SALT WHERE USER_SEQ = @USER_SEQ
